name: che-things-mcp
description: Native AppleScript integration for Things 3 task management app
long_description: A Swift-based MCP server providing 15 tools for managing Things 3 tasks and projects. Features include inbox, today, upcoming, anytime, someday, and logbook access, plus full CRUD operations for todos and projects. Uses native AppleScript for reliable integration. Requires macOS 13.0 or later and Things 3 installed.

tools.name: get_inbox
tools.description: Get all to-dos in the Inbox

tools.name: get_today
tools.description: Get all to-dos scheduled for Today

tools.name: get_upcoming
tools.description: Get all to-dos in the Upcoming list

tools.name: get_anytime
tools.description: Get all to-dos in the Anytime list

tools.name: get_someday
tools.description: Get all to-dos in the Someday list

tools.name: get_logbook
tools.description: Get completed to-dos from the Logbook

tools.name: add_todo
tools.description: Create a new to-do with optional scheduling

tools.name: complete_todo
tools.description: Mark a to-do as completed or incomplete

tools.name: search_todos
tools.description: Search for to-dos by name or notes
